anya-e0901n:11: Pucchā – paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:12: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahādhammasaṃgītiyaṃ bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:13: Pucchā – dhammo nāma āvuso suttantābhidhammavasena duvidho, tattha kataraṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:14: Vissajjanā – dvīsu bhante dhammesu suttantābhidhammapiṭakesu paṭhamaṃ suttantaṃ piṭakaṃ dhammaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:15: Pucchā – suttantapiṭake pi āvuso dīghamajjhimasaṃyuttaaṅguttarakhuddakanikāyavasena pañca nikāyā, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ nikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:16: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante nikāyesu paṭhamaṃ dīghanikāyaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:17: Pucchā – dīghanikāyepi āvuso tayo vaggā catuttiṃsā ca suttāni, tesu kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ paṭhamaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:18: Vissajjanā – dīghanikāyepi bhante tīsu vaggesu paṭhamaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggaṃ, catuttiṃsatiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ brahmajālasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0901n:20_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgāyituṃ pubbakiccāni
anya-e0901n:20_1: samārabhāma…, tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena brahmajālasuttaṃ kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:21: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ ambalaṭṭhikāyaṃ rājāgārake bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:23: Vissajjanā – suppiyañca bhante paribbājakaṃ brahmadattañca māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:25_0: Vissajjanā – vaṇṇāvaṇṇe bhante, suppiyo hi bhante anekapariyāyena buddhassa avaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0901n:25_1: bhāsati dhammassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati saṅghassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, suppiyassa pana paribbājakassa
anya-e0901n:25_2: antevāsī brahmadatto māṇavo anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0901n:25_3: bhāsati saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:28: Vissajjanā – tayo bhante tattha anusandhayo, eko avaṇṇānusandhi, dve vaṇṇānusandhiyo.
anya-e0901n:30: Pucchā – tatthāvuso paṭhame anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ saṃkhepato kathehi.
anya-e0901n:31: Vissajjanā – paṭhame bhante anusandhimhi avaṇṇe manopadosaṃ nivāretvā, tattha ca ādīnavaṃ dassetvā, tattha paṭipajjitabbākāro bhagavatā bhāsito.
anya-e0901n:32: Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ saṅghassa vā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na āghāto appaccayo na cetaso anabhiraddhi karaṇīyā…
anya-e0901n:34_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṃ sāgatakhantīguṇasamannāgato
anya-e0901n:34_1: attano sāvakabhūte amhepi tattha samādāpesi, attanā ca lokadhammesu aniñjanasabhāvo
anya-e0901n:34_2: amhākampi tathattāya ovādamadāsi, dutiyepanāvuso anusandhimhi kathaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
anya-e0901n:35_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye pana bhante anusandhimhi vaṇṇe cetaso uppilāvitattaṃ nisedhetvā,
anya-e0901n:35_1: tattha ca ādīnavaṃ dassetvā, tattha ca paṭipajjanākāraṃ dassetvā, puthujjanassa vaṇṇabhūmibhūtāni
anya-e0901n:36: Mamaṃ vā bhikkhave pare vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, dhammassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, saṅghassa vā vaṇṇaṃ bhāseyyuṃ, tatra tumhehi na ānando na somanassaṃ na cetaso abhiraddhi karaṇīyā –
anya-e0901n:38_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā paramukkaṃsagatasuparisuddhasīlasamannāgato,
anya-e0901n:38_1: taṃ attano suparisuddhasīlaṃ dassetvā parepi tattha niyojesi, tatiye panāvuso anusandhimhi
anya-e0901n:38_2: kathaṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ, taṃ saṃkhepato pakāsehi.
anya-e0901n:39_0: Vissajjanā – tatiye pana bhante anusandhimhi dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo sabbaññuta ñāṇena
anya-e0901n:39_1: vitthārato vibhajitvā, tāsañca cha phassāyatanapadaṭṭhānabhāvaṃ vibhāvetvā, micchādiṭṭhigatikādhiṭṭhā
anya-e0901n:39_2: nañca vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā, yuttayogabhikkhuadhiṭṭhānañca vivaṭṭaṃ kathetvā, micchādiṭṭhigatikassa
anya-e0901n:39_3: desanājālato avimuttabhāvaṃ desanājālato vimuttassa natthikabhāvañca vibhāvetvā,
anya-e0901n:39_4: attano ca katthaci apariyāpannabhāvaṃ dassetvā, upādisesanibbānadhātuṃ pāpetvā desanā
anya-e0901n:40: Ucchinnabhāvanettiko bhikkhave tathāgatassa kāyo tiṭṭhati, yāvassa kāyo ṭhassati tāva naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā, kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā na naṃ dakkhanti devamanussā.
anya-e0901n:42_0: Pucchā – sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho bhagavā attanā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo ca cha phassāyatanāni
anya-e0901n:42_1: ca dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādaṅgāni ca sabbaso parijānitvā tesaṃ parijānanatthāya paresampi
anya-e0901n:42_2: tathattāya dhammaṃ pakāseti, suttañca nāma āvuso catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ aññataravaseneva
anya-e0901n:42_3: nikkhittaṃ, tasmā tesu idaṃ suttaṃ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n:43: Vissajjanā – catūsu bhante suttanikkhepesu aṭṭhuppattinikkhepana idaṃ suttaṃ nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n:45: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
anya-e0901n:48: Pucchā – atthi nu kho āvuso ettha koci viraddhadosā, yena pacchimā janā micchāatthaṃ gaṇheyyuṃ.
anya-e0901n:51: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sāmaññaphalasuttaṃ kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:52: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakassa komārabhaccassa ambavane bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:54: Vissajjanā – raññā bhante māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena saddhiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:55: Pucchā – taṃ panāvuso suttaṃ catunnaṃ suttanikkhepānaṃ katarena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā nikkhittaṃ.
anya-e0901n:56: Vissajjanā – catunnaṃ bhante suttanikkhepānaṃ pucchāvasikena suttanikkhepena nikkhitaṃ bhagavatā.
anya-e0901n:58: Pucchā – sā panāvuso pucchā kenākārena samuppannā.
anya-e0901n:59_0: Vissajjanā – rājā bhante māgadho ajāsattu vedehiputto tadahuposathe pannarase komudiyā
anya-e0901n:59_1: cātumāsiniyā puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā yena bhagavā tenupasaṃkami, upasaṃkamitvā
anya-e0901n:59_2: bhagavantaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme saṃdiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi, evaṃ kho sā bhante pucchā uppannā.
anya-e0901n:60: Rammaṇīyā vata bho dosinā ratti, abhirūpā vata bho dosinā ratti, dassanīyā vata bho dosinā ratti, pāsādikā vata bho dosinā ratti, lakkhaññā vata bho dosinā ratti….
anya-e0901n:61: Kaṃ nukhvajja samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā payirupāseyyāma….
anya-e0901n:64: Tvaṃ pana samma jīvaka kiṃ tuṇhīsi –
anya-e0901n:65: Ayaṃ deva amhākaṃ bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho amhākaṃ ambavane viharati.
anya-e0901n:66_0: Taṃ kho pana bhagavantaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato “itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ
anya-e0901n:66_1: sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti.
anya-e0901n:67: Taṃ devo bhagavantaṃ payirupāsatu, appevanāma devassa bhagavantaṃ payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyya.
anya-e0901n:68: Tena hi samma jīvaka hatthiyānāni kappāpehi.
anya-e0901n:69: Kappitāni kho te deva hatthiyānāni, yassa dāni kālaṃ maññasi.
anya-e0901n:71: Kicci maṃ samma jīvaka na vañcesi, kacci maṃ samma jīvaka na palambhesi….
anya-e0901n:72: Mā bhāyi mahārāja, mā bhāyi mahārāja….
anya-e0901n:73: Na taṃ deva vañcemi, na taṃ deva palambhāmi….
anya-e0901n:75: Eso mahārāja bhagavā, eso mahārāja bhagavā majjhimaṃ thambhaṃ nissāya puratthābhimukho nisinno purakkhato bhikkhusaṅghassa….
anya-e0901n:76: Iminā me upasamena udayabhaddo kumāro samannāgato hotu…
anya-e0901n:77: Agamā kho tvaṃ mahārāja yathā pemaṃ.
anya-e0901n:78: Puccheyyāmahaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ sace me bhagavā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāya.
anya-e0901n:80_0: Yathā nu kho imāni bhante puthusippāyatanāni, seyyathidaṃ, hatthārohā assārohā rathikā
anya-e0901n:80_1: dhanuggahā celakā calakā piṇḍadāyakā (peyyāla) gaṇakā muddikā, aññānipi evaṃ gatikāni
anya-e0901n:80_2: puthusippāyatanāni, te tena sippena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sippaphalaṃ jīvanti, te tena attānaṃ
anya-e0901n:80_3: sukhenti pīṇenti, mātāpitaro sukhenti, pīṇenti, puttadāraṃ sukhenti pīṇenti, mittāmacce
anya-e0901n:80_4: sukhenti pīṇenti samaṇabrāhmaṇesu uddhaggikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhapenti sovaggikaṃ
anya-e0901n:80_5: sukhavipākaṃ saggasaṃvattanikaṃ, sakkā nu kho bhante evameva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e0901n:81: Pucchā – tadā āvuso kathaṃ bhagavatā rājā ajātasattu vedehi putto paṭipucchito kathañca tena bhagavato ārocitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:82_0: Vissajjanā – “abhijānāsi no tvaṃ mahārāja imaṃ pañhaṃ aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitāti,
anya-e0901n:82_1: abhijānāmahaṃ bhante aññe samaṇabrāhmaṇe pucchitāti, yathākathaṃ pana te mahārāja
anya-e0901n:82_2: byākariṃsu, sace te agaru, bhāsassūti na kho me bhante garu, yatthassa bhagavā nisinno
anya-e0901n:82_3: bhavantarūpo vāti, tenehi mahārāja bhāsassū”ti, evaṃ kho bhante tadā bhagavatā rājā
anya-e0901n:82_4: māgadho ajātasattu vedehi putto paṭipucchito, evaṃ kho bhante tena tadā bhagavato ārocitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:84: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso pūraṇakassapassa santike pucchāvissajjanā ahosi.
anya-e0901n:85_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena pūraṇo
anya-e0901n:85_1: kassapo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā pūraṇaṃ kassapaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n:85_2: pucchi, atha kho bhante pūraṇo kassapo karoto kho mahārāja kārayato, chindato chedāpayato,
anya-e0901n:85_3: pacato pācāpayato, socayato socāpayato (peyyāla) karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ tyādinā
anya-e0901n:85_4: rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa saṃdiṭṭhi kaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho
anya-e0901n:85_5: samāno akiriyaṃ byākāsi, evaṃ kho bhante pūraṇassa kassapassa santike pucchāvissajjanā ahosi.
anya-e0901n:87_0: Nissiriko vata āvuso pūraṇassa kassapassa vādo anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ativiya
anya-e0901n:87_1: bhayānako, ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ
anya-e0901n:87_2: ahitāya dukkhāya, ettakeneva ajja mayaṃ pucchāvissajjanaṃ thapessāma.
anya-e0901n:89_0: Pucchā – purimadivase āvuso mayā sāmaññaphalasuttassa nidānapariyāpannāni pucchitabbaṭṭhānāni
anya-e0901n:89_1: kānici kānici pucchitāni, tayā ca suṭṭhu vissajjitāni, ajja pana yathānuppattamakkhaligosāya
anya-e0901n:89_2: vādato paṭṭhāya pucchissāmi, makkhali pana āvuso
anya-e0901n:90: Gosālo raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:91_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena makkhaligosālo
anya-e0901n:91_1: tenupasaṃkami, upasaṃkamitvā makkhaliṃ gosālaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ pucchi,
anya-e0901n:91_2: atha kho bhante makkhaligosālo rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0901n:91_3: “natthi mahārāja hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāya, ahetū apaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti.
anya-e0901n:91_4: Natthi mahārāja hetu natthi paccayo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā, ahetū apaccayā sattā visujjhanti,
anya-e0901n:91_5: (peyyāla) cullāsīti mahākappino satasahassāni, yāni bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā
anya-e0901n:91_6: saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karissanti, tattha natthi ‘imināhaṃ sīlena vā vatena vā
anya-e0901n:91_7: tapena vā brahmacariyena vā aparipakkaṃ vā kammaṃ paripācessāmi, paripakkaṃ vā kammaṃ
anya-e0901n:91_8: phussa phussa byantiṃ karissāmī’ti hevaṃ natthi. Doṇamite sukhadukkhe, pariyantakate
anya-e0901n:91_9: saṃsāre natthi hāyanavaḍḍhane, natthi ukkaṃsāvakaṃse. Seyyathāpi nāma suttapuṭṭhe
anya-e0901n:91_10: khitte nibbeṭhiyamānameva paleti, evameva bāle ca paṇḍite ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā
anya-e0901n:91_11: dukkhassantaṃ karissantī”ti, itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa
anya-e0901n:91_12: makkhaligosālo sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno saṃsārasuddhiṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:93: Ayampi āvuso vādo nissirikoyeva anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ati viya bhayānako, ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0901n:95: Pucchā – athāparampi pucchāmi, ajito pana āvuso kesakambalo raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:96_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena ajito
anya-e0901n:96_1: kesakambalo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā ajitaṃ kesakambalaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n:96_2: pucchi, atha kho bhante ajito kesakambalo rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ
anya-e0901n:96_3: etadavoca “natthi mahārāja dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ, natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ
anya-e0901n:96_4: kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko, natthi ayaṃ loko, natthi paro loko, natthi mātā, natthi pitā,
anya-e0901n:96_5: natthi sattā opapātikā, natthi loke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sammaggatā sammāpaṭipannā, ye
anya-e0901n:96_6: imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedenti. (Peyyāla) bāle ca
anya-e0901n:96_7: paṇḍite ca kāyassa bhedā ucchijjanti vinassantī”ti. Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa
anya-e0901n:96_8: ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa ajito kesakambalo sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho
anya-e0901n:98: Ayampi kho āvuso nissirikoyeva, anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ati viya bhayānako, ye tassa vacanaṃ sotabbaṃ saddhātabbaṃ maññeyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0901n:100: Pucchā – athāparampi pucchāmi, pakudho pana āvuso kaccāyano raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:101_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena pakudho
anya-e0901n:101_1: kaccāyano tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā pakudhaṃ kaccāyanaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n:101_2: pucchi, atha kho bhante pakudho kaccāyano rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajāsattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ
anya-e0901n:101_3: etadavoca “sattime mahārāja kāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā animmitā animmātā vañcā kūṭaṭṭhā
anya-e0901n:101_4: esikaṭṭhāyitā, te na iñjanti, na vipariṇāmenti, na aññamaññaṃ byābādhenti, nālaṃ
anya-e0901n:101_5: aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya vā. Katame satta, pathavīkāyo,
anya-e0901n:101_6: āpokāyo, tejokāyo vāyokāyo, sukhe, dukkhe, jīve sattame. Ime sattakāyā akaṭā akaṭavidhā
anya-e0901n:101_7: animmitā animmātā vañcyā kūṭaṭṭhā esikaṭṭhāyitā, te na iñjanti, na vipariṇāmenti,
anya-e0901n:101_8: na aññamaññaṃ byābādhenti, nālaṃ aññamaññassa sukhāya vā dukkhāya vā sukhadukkhāya
anya-e0901n:101_9: vā. Tattha natthi hantā vā ghātetā vā, sotā vā sāvetā vā, viññātā vā viññāpetā vā,
anya-e0901n:101_10: yopi tiṇhena satthena sīsaṃ chindati, na koci kiñci jivitā voropeti, sattannaṃtveva
anya-e0901n:101_11: kāyānamantarena satthaṃ vivaramanupatatī”ti. Itthaṃ kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa
anya-e0901n:101_12: vedehiputtassa pakudho kaccāyano sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho samāno aññena aññaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:103: Ayampi kho āvuso vādo purimavādoviya nissirikoyeva anatthasaṃhito jigucchanīyo ativiya bhayānako.
anya-e0901n:105: Pucchā – athāparampi pucchāmi, nigaṇṭho panāvuso nāṭaputto raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:106_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena nigaṇṭho
anya-e0901n:106_1: nāṭaputto tenupasaṃkami, upasaṃkamitvā nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n:106_2: pucchi, atha kho nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca,
anya-e0901n:106_3: “idha mahārāja nigaṇṭho cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto hoti, kathañca mahārāja
anya-e0901n:107_0: Nigaṇṭho cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto hoti, idha mahārāja nigaṇṭho sabbavārivārito ca hoti,
anya-e0901n:107_1: sabbavāriyutto ca, sabbavāridhuto ca, sabbavāriphuṭo ca. Evaṃ kho mahārāja nigaṇṭho
anya-e0901n:107_2: cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto hoti, yato kho mahārāja nigaṇṭho evaṃ cātuyāmasaṃvarasaṃvuto
anya-e0901n:107_3: hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati mahārāja nigaṇṭho gatatto ca yatatto ca ṭhitatto cā”ti. Itthaṃ
anya-e0901n:107_4: kho bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e0901n:109_0: Etassa panāvuso vāde koci sāsanānulomavādo atthi, asuddhaladdhitāya pana esopi vādo
anya-e0901n:109_1: jigucchanīyoyeva, seyyathāpi bhojanaṃ gūthamissaṃ gārayhoyeva ārakā parivajjitabboyeva,
anya-e0901n:111: Pucchā – athāparampi pucchāmi, sañcayo panāvuso belaṭṭhaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho kathaṃ byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:112_0: Vissajjanā – ekamidaṃ bhante samayaṃ rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto yena sañcayo
anya-e0901n:112_1: belaṭṭhaputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā sañcayaṃ belaṭṭhaputtaṃ etadavoca, “yathā
anya-e0901n:112_2: nu kho imāni bho sañcaya puthusippāyatanāni, seyyathidaṃ, hatthārohā assarohā…pe…
anya-e0901n:112_3: sakkā nu kho bho sañcaya evameva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññapetu”nti,
anya-e0901n:112_4: evaṃ vutte bhante sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto rājānaṃ māgadhaṃ ajātasattuṃ vedehiputtaṃ etadavoca.
anya-e0901n:113: “Atthi parolokoti iti ce maṃ pucchasi, atthi paro lokoti iti ce me assa, atthi paro
anya-e0901n:114_0: Lokoti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ, evantipi me no, tathātipi me no, aññathātipi me no,
anya-e0901n:114_1: notipi me no, no notipi me no…pe… neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti
anya-e0901n:114_2: ce maṃ pucchasi, neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti ce me assa, neva
anya-e0901n:114_3: hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇāti iti te naṃ byākareyyaṃ, evantipi me no,
anya-e0901n:114_4: tathātipi me no, aññathātipi me no, notipi me no, no notipi me no”ti. Itthaṃ kho
anya-e0901n:114_5: bhante rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sañcayo belaṭṭhaputto sandiṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e0901n:116: Sabbepi āvuso ete channaṃ satthārānaṃ vādā nissirikāyeva jigucchanīyāyeva anatthasaṃhitāyeva, bālānaṃ bhiyyoso mattāya sammohāya saṃvattanti anatthāya.
anya-e0901n:117: Ajja pana āvuso kālo atikkanto, sveyeva bhagavatā vuttaṃ paṇītaṃ pasaṭṭhaṃ sandiṭṭhikaphalaṃ pucchāma.
anya-e0901n:118_0: Pucchā – purimadivasesu āvuso sāmaññaphalasuttassa pubbabhāge yāva chasatthāramicchāvādapariyosānaṃ
anya-e0901n:118_1: pucchanavissajjanaṃ amhehi kataṃ, ajja pana yathānuppattaṃ bhagavatā desitasāmaññaphalasuttādhikāre
anya-e0901n:118_2: pucchāvissajjanaṃ karissāma. Bhagavā pana āvuso raññā māgadhena ajātasattunā vedehiputtena
anya-e0901n:119: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante tidhā vibhajitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ puṭṭho byākāsi.
anya-e0901n:120: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n:121: Vissajjanā – dāsaṃ bhante pabbajitaṃ upamābhāvena niddisitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa bhagavā paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n:122_0: Sohaṃ bhante bhagavantampi pucchāmi, yathā nu kho imāni bhante puthusippāyatanāni
anya-e0901n:122_1: seyyathidaṃ…pe… sakkā nu kho bhante eva meva diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ paññapetuṃ –
anya-e0901n:123_0: Acchariyaṃ āvuso abbhutaṃ āvuso, yāva svākhātassa buddhasāsanassa mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā,
anya-e0901n:123_1: yatrahi nāma dāsopi nihīnajacco evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā attano issarabhūtena
anya-e0901n:123_2: raññāpi vandanīyattaṃ garukaraṇīyattaṃ pāpuṇissati, supaññattametaṃ bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaphalaṃ.
anya-e0901n:124: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa dutiyaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n:125: Vissajjanā – kassakaṃ bhante pabbajitaṃ upamābhāvena dassetvā bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n:126_0: Acchariyaṃ āvuso abbhutaṃ āvuso, yāva buddhasāsanassa svākhātatā mahiddhikatā mahānubhāvatā,
anya-e0901n:126_1: yatrahi nāma kassa kopi guṇarahito evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajitvā raṭṭhadhipatinā
anya-e0901n:126_2: manussaloke devabhūtena raññāpi garukaraṇīyataṃ vandanīyataṃ pāpuṇissati, supaññattametaṃ
anya-e0901n:127: Pucchā – kathañcā panāvuso bhagavā purimehi sandiṭṭhikasāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ rañño desesi.
anya-e0901n:128_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante buddhuppādato paṭṭhāya kulaputtassa pabbajita bhāvaṃ,
anya-e0901n:128_1: tassa ca sīlasampadaṃ, tassa ca indriyesu guttadvārataṃ, ariyañcasatisampajaññaṃ,
anya-e0901n:128_2: ariyañca santuṭṭhiṃ, pañcannañca nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānaṃ, cattāri ca jhānāni, aṭṭha ca
anya-e0901n:128_3: vijjāyo, tāhi tāhi upamāhi vitthārato vibhajitvā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa
anya-e0901n:128_4: sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca
anya-e0901n:129: Sakkā pana bhante diṭṭheva dhamme sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ, purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca paññapetuṃ.
anya-e0901n:130: Sakkā mahārājā, tena hi mahārāja suṇohi sādhukaṃ manasikarohi bhāsissāmi.
anya-e0901n:131: Pucchā – kathañca panāvuso bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti, kathañca bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa cūḷasīlaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:132_0: Vissajjanā – “kathañca mahārāja bhikkhu sīlasampanno hoti. Idha mahārāja bhikkhu
anya-e0901n:132_1: pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho lajjī dayāpanno,
anya-e0901n:132_2: sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati. Idampissa hoti sīlasmiṃ” evamādinā bhante bhagavā
anya-e0901n:132_3: rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa chabbīsatiyā ākārehi cūḷasīlaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:133: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu sādhu āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbājito iminā ca cūḷasīlena samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:136: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso rañño māgadhassa ajātasattuno vedehiputtassa majjhimasīlañca mahāsīlañca vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:137_0: Vissajjanā – “yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā
anya-e0901n:137_1: te evarūpaṃ bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhaṃ anuyuttā viharanti. Seyyathidaṃ. Mūlabījaṃ
anya-e0901n:137_2: khandhabījaṃ phaḷubījaṃ aggabījaṃ bījabījameva pañcamaṃ, iti evarūpā bījagāmabhūtagāmasamārambhā
anya-e0901n:137_3: paṭivirato hoti. Idampissa hoti sīlasmiṃ” evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa
anya-e0901n:137_4: ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa majjhimasīlañca mahāsīlañca vitthārato vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:138: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ ariyena sīlena samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:139: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso ariyaṃ indriyasaṃvarañca ariyaṃ satisampajaññañca ariyaṃ santosañca bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:140_0: Vissajjanā – idha mahārāja bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nanubyañjanaggāhī,
anya-e0901n:140_1: yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ viharantaṃ abhijjhādomanassā pāpakā akusalā
anya-e0901n:140_2: dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ, tassa saṃvarāya paṭipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriyaṃ, cakkhundriye
anya-e0901n:141: Idha mahārāja bhikkhu satisampajaññena samannāgato hoti, abhikkante paṭikkante sampajanakārī hoti,
anya-e0901n:142_0: Ālokite vilokite sampajānakārī hoti, samiñjite pasārite sampajānakārī hoti, saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇe
anya-e0901n:142_1: sampajānakārī hoti, asite pīte khāyite sāyite sampajānakārī hoti, uccārapassāvakamme
anya-e0901n:142_2: sampajānakārī hoti, gate ṭhite nisinne sutte jāgarite bhāsite tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī
anya-e0901n:142_3: hoti, evaṃ kho mahārāja bhikkhu satisampajaññena samannāgato hoti.
anya-e0901n:143: Kathañca mahārāja bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti, idha mahārāja bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena.
anya-e0901n:144: Evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa ariyañca indriyesuguttadvārataṃ ariyañca satisampajaññaṃ ariyañca santosaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:145: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito iminā ca ariyena indriyasaṃvarena samannāgato, iminā ca ariyena satisampajaññena
anya-e0901n:146: Samannāgato, imāya ca ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:147: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nīvaraṇapahānaṃ vibhajitvā desesi.
anya-e0901n:148_0: Vissajjanā – so evaṃ ariyena sīlakkhandhena samannāgato, ariyena indriyasaṃvarena
anya-e0901n:148_1: samannāgato, ariyena satisampajaññena samannāgato, ariyāya santuṭṭhiyā samannāgato,
anya-e0901n:148_2: vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ bhajati araññaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ pabbataṃ kandaraṃ giriguhaṃ susānaṃ
anya-e0901n:148_3: vanapattaṃ abbhokāsaṃ palālapuñjaṃ. So pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto nisīdati
anya-e0901n:148_4: pallaṅkaṃ ābhuñjitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā. So abhijjhaṃ
anya-e0901n:148_5: loke pahāya vigatābhijjhena cetasā viharati…pe… tassime pañca nīvaraṇe pahīne attani
anya-e0901n:148_6: samanupassato pāmojjaṃ jāyati, pamuditassa pīti jāyati, pītimanassa kāyo passambhati,
anya-e0901n:148_7: passaddhakāyo sukhaṃ vedehi, sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyati. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0901n:148_8: rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa nīvaraṇappahānaṃ vibhajitvā vitthārato desesi.
anya-e0901n:149: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ pañcanīvaraṇe pajahitvā tehi cittaṃ visodhetvā vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:150_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0901n:150_1: sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi, purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n:151_0: Vissajjanā – so vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ
anya-e0901n:151_1: vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati…pe… idampi kho mahārāja
anya-e0901n:151_2: sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca
anya-e0901n:152_0: Paṇītatarañca. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa
anya-e0901n:152_1: paṭhamaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca
anya-e0901n:153: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā evaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ
anya-e0901n:154: Upasampajja vivekajena pītisukhena attano kāyaṃ abhisandeyya parisandeyya paripūreyya.
anya-e0901n:155: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā dutiyañca tatiyañca catutthañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi, purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n:156_0: Vissajjanā – puna ca paraṃ mahārāja bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ
anya-e0901n:156_1: cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃjhānaṃ upasampajja
anya-e0901n:156_2: viharati evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa dutiyañca
anya-e0901n:156_3: tatiyañca catutthañca sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi
anya-e0901n:157_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0901n:157_1: dhammavinaye saddhāpabbajito evaṃ dutiyajhānañca tatiyajhānañca catutthajhānañca
anya-e0901n:157_2: upasampajja tehi jhānasukhehi attano kāyaṃ abhisandetvā parisandetvā paripūretvā vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:158_0: Pucchā – kathañca panāvuso bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa
anya-e0901n:158_1: aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi, purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi
anya-e0901n:159_0: Vissajjanā – so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0901n:159_1: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte ñāṇadassanāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti,
anya-e0901n:159_2: so evaṃ pajānāti “ayaṃ kho me kāyo rūpī cātumahābhūtiko mātāpettikasambhavo odanakummāsūpacayo
anya-e0901n:159_4: sitaṃ ettha paṭibandhanti…pe… idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi
anya-e0901n:159_5: sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0901n:159_6: rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ
anya-e0901n:159_7: purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n:160: Suññāraṃgā paviṭṭhassa, santacittassa bhikkhuno. Amānusī ratī hoti, sammādhammaṃ vipassato.
anya-e0901n:161_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ bhikkhu evaṃ svākhāte buddhasāsanasaṅkhāte
anya-e0901n:161_1: dhammavinaye saddhāpabbajito evaṃ ñāṇadassanaṃ uppādetvā evaṃ ñāṇadassanena samannāgato hutvā vihareyya.
anya-e0901n:162: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi, purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca.
anya-e0901n:163_0: Vissajjanā – so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0901n:163_1: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte manomayaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmānāya cittaṃ abhinīharati
anya-e0901n:163_2: abhininnāmeti, so imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgiṃ
anya-e0901n:163_3: ahīnindriyaṃ evamādinā bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa

anya-e0901n:176_3: dvepi jātiyo…pe… idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi

anya-e0901n:179_1: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte sattānaṃ cutūpapātañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati
anya-e0901n:179_2: abhininnāmeti, so dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne
anya-e0901n:179_3: upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate yathākammupage satte pajānāti…pe…
anya-e0901n:179_4: idampi kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi
anya-e0901n:179_5: abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca. Itthaṃ kho bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa
anya-e0901n:179_6: vedehiputtassa aparampi sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi
anya-e0901n:180_0: Acchariyaṃ āvuso, abbhutaṃ āvuso, yāva buddhasāsanassa svākhātatā, yatrahi nāma evaṃ
anya-e0901n:180_1: svākhāte buddhasāsane pabbajito sāvakopi sammāpaṭipanno evaṃ visesaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ paṭilabhissati.
anya-e0901n:181: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso bhagavā pariyosāne uttaritaraṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ desesi.
anya-e0901n:182_0: Vissajjanā – so evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese
anya-e0901n:182_1: mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite āneñjappatte āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāya cittaṃ abhinīharati abhininnāmeti…pe…
anya-e0901n:182_2: idaṃ kho mahārāja sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi
anya-e0901n:182_3: abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca. Imasmā ca pana mahārāja sandiṭṭhikā sāmaññaphalā
anya-e0901n:182_4: aññaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ sāmaññaphalaṃ uttaritaraṃ vā paṇītataraṃ vā natthīti. Itthaṃ kho
anya-e0901n:182_5: bhante bhagavā rañño māgadhassa ajātasattussa vedehiputtassa pariyosānaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ
anya-e0901n:182_6: sāmaññaphalaṃ purimehi sandiṭṭhikehi sāmaññaphalehi abhikkantatarañca paṇītatarañca desesi.
anya-e0901n:183: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso, yaṃ bhikkhu buddhasāsane saddhāpabbajito evaṃ svākhāte dhammavinaye sammāpaṭipanno āsavakkhayañāṇaṃ pāpuṇitvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
anya-e0901n:184: Pucchā – kathaṃ panāvuso rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto imissā desanāya pariyosāne bhagavati ca desanāyañca pasanno pasannākāraṃ akāsi, kīdisañca ānisaṃsaṃ paṭilabhi.
anya-e0901n:185_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ vutte bhante māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca,
anya-e0901n:185_1: abhikkantaṃ bhante, abhikkantaṃ bhante, seyyathāpi bhante nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya,
anya-e0901n:185_2: paṭicchannaṃ vā vivareyya…pe… ajjatagge pāṇṇupetaṃ saraṇaṃ gatanti, ayañhi bhante
anya-e0901n:185_3: rājā pitumāritakālato paṭṭhāya neva rattiṃ na divā niddaṃ paṭilabhati, satthāraṃ
anya-e0901n:185_4: pana upasaṅkamitvā imāya madhurāya ojavantiyā dhammadesanāya sutakālato paṭṭhāya
anya-e0901n:185_5: niddaṃ paṭilabhati, tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ mahāsakkāramakāsi, puthujjanikāya saddhāya samannāgato
anya-e0901n:185_6: nāma iminā raññā sadiso nāhosi, anāgate pana vijitāvī nāma paccekabuddho hutvā parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0901n:185_7: Evaṃ kho bhante rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto desanāpariyosāne pasanno pasannākāramakāsi,
anya-e0901n:187: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavā jānatā arahatā passatā sammāsambuddhena ambaṭṭhaṃ ṭāma suttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:188: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante janapade icchānaṅgale nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme ambaṭṭhaṃ nāma māṇavaṃ brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa antevāsiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:190: Pucchā – soṇadaṇḍaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:191: Vissajjanā – aṅgesu bhante janapade campāyaṃ soṇadaṇḍaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:193: Pucchā – kūṭadantaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:194: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante khāṇumate nāma brāhmaṇagāme kūṭadanta brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:196: Pucchā – mahāliṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:197: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante oṭṭhaddhaṃ nāma licchaviṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:199: Pucchā – jāliyaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:200: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante dve pabbajite ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:202: Pucchā – mahāsīhanādaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:203: Vissajjanā – uruññāyaṃ bhante kaṇṇakathale acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:205: Pucchā – poṭṭhapādaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:206: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante poṭṭhapādañca paribbājakaṃ cittañca hatthisāriputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:208: Pucchā – subhasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:209: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā ānandena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena subhaṃ māṇavaṃ todeyyaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:211: Pucchā – kevaṭṭaṃ panāvuso suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:212: Vissajjanā – nāḷandā yaṃ bhante kevaṭṭaṃ gahapatiputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:214: Pucchā – lohiccasutta panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:215: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante janapade sālavatikāyaṃ lohiccaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:217: Pucchā – tevijjasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:218: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante manasākaṭe nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme vāseṭṭhaṃ bhāradvājaṃ māṇavaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:220_0: Pucchā – tena āvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mahāpadānasuttaṃ
anya-e0901n:220_1: dīghanikāye mahāvagge porāṇakehi saṅgitikārehi paṭhamaṃ saṅgitaṃ bhagavatā kattha
anya-e0901n:221_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sambahulānaṃ
anya-e0901n:221_1: bhante bhikkhūnaṃ pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantānaṃ maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0901n:221_2: sannipatitānaṃ pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammīkathā udapādi, itipi pubbenivāso itipi
anya-e0901n:223: Pucchā – mahānidānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:224_0: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0901n:224_1: bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “acchariyaṃ bhante,
anya-e0901n:224_2: abbhutaṃ bhante, yāva gambhīrocāyaṃ bhante paṭiccasamuppādo
anya-e0901n:225: Gambhīrāvabhāso ca, atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:227_0: Pucchā – mahāparinibbānasuttaṃ panāvuso bahuanusandhikaṃ, bahudesanā saṅgahaṃ, buddhassa
anya-e0901n:227_2: taṃ antarābhedavasena vibhajja paricchijja paricchijja pucchissāmi, tatthāvuso bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0901n:228: Rājūnaṃ aparihāniyadhammadesanā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:229_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante vassakāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ magadhamahāmattaṃ ārabbha bhāsitā,
anya-e0901n:229_1: vassakāro bhante brāhmaṇo magadhamahāmatto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca “rājā
anya-e0901n:229_2: bho gotama māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto vajjī abhiyātukāmo so evamāha ahaṃ hime
anya-e0901n:229_3: vajjī evaṃ mahiddhike evaṃ mahānubhāve ucchecchāmi vajjī vināsessāmi vajjī anayabyasanaṃ
anya-e0901n:229_4: āpādessāmī vajjī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:230: Pucchā – bhikkhūnaṃ panāvuso aparihāniyadhammadesanā bhagavatā kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:231: Vissajjanā – tasmiṃyeva bhante rājagahe tasmiṃyeva vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:233: Pucchā – dhammādāso āvuso dhammapariyāyo bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsito.
anya-e0901n:234_0: Vissajjanā – nātike bhante giñjakāvasathe āyasmantaṃ ānanda ārabbha bhāsito, āyasmā
anya-e0901n:234_1: bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā nātikiyānaṃ dvādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ gatiabhisamparāyaṃ
anya-e0901n:236: Pucchā – attadīpadhammadesanā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:237_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante veḷuvagāmake āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitā, āyasmā
anya-e0901n:237_1: bhante ānando bhagavato gilānavuṭṭhitassa aciravuṭṭhitassa gelaññā bhagavato gelaññena
anya-e0901n:237_2: attano khedapattakāraṇaṃ ārocesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:239_0: Pucchā – bhagavatā āvuso purima dutiyadivase pucchitavissajjitakkamena attadīpadhammadesanañca
anya-e0901n:239_1: aññāni ca dhammadesanāni kathetvā pariniṭṭhita sabbabuddhakiccena āyusaṅkhāro kattha ossaṭṭho.
anya-e0901n:240: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante cāpāle cetiye mārena pāpimatā yācito bhagavā satena sampajānena āyusaṅkhāro ossaṭṭho.
anya-e0901n:241: “Parinibbātu dāni bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato, parinibbāna kālo dāni bhante bhagavato.
anya-e0901n:242: Apposukko tvaṃ pāpima hoti, na ciraṃ tathāgatassa parinibbānaṃ bhavissati, ito tiṇṇaṃ māsānaṃ accayena tathāgato parinibbāyissati.
anya-e0901n:244: Pucchā – catumahāpadesadhammadesanā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:245: Vissajjanā – bhoganagare bhante ānande cetiye bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:246: Paripakko vayo mayhaṃ, parittaṃ mama jīvitaṃ. Pahāya vo gamissāmi, kataṃ me saraṇamattano.
anya-e0901n:248: Pucchā – catusaṃvejanīyakathā panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:249_0: Vissajjanā – kusinārāyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitā, āyasmā bhante
anya-e0901n:249_1: ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe bhante disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū āgacchanti
anya-e0901n:249_2: tathāgataṃ dassanāya, te mayaṃ labhāma manobhāvanīye bhikkhū dassanāya, labhāma payirupāsanāya.
anya-e0901n:249_3: Bhagavato pana mayaṃ bhante accayena na labhissāma manobhāvanīye bhikkhū dassanāya,
anya-e0901n:249_4: na labhissāma payirupāsanāyā”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitā.
anya-e0901n:250: Yehi keci ānanda cetiyacārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā pasannacittā kālaṃ karissanti, sabbete kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjissanti hu –
anya-e0901n:251: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ mātugāmesu paṭipajjitabbavattaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0901n:252: Vissajjanā – adassanaṃ ānandāti ca anālāpo ānandāti ca sati ānanda upaṭṭhabbetabbāti ca evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā mātugāmesu paṭipajjitabbākāraṃ kathesi.
anya-e0901n:254: Pucchā – mahāsudassanasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:255: Vissajjanā – tissaṃyeva bhante kusinārāyaṃ āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā bhante ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mā bhante bhagavā imasmiṃ khuddakanagarake
anya-e0901n:256_0: Ujjaṅgalanagarake sākhānagarake parinibbāyi. Santi bhante aññāni mahānagarāni. Seyyathidaṃ,
anya-e0901n:256_1: campā, rājagahaṃ, sāvatthī, sāketaṃ, kosambī, bārāṇasī, ettha bhagavā parinibbāyatu,
anya-e0901n:256_2: ettha bahū khattiyamahāsālā brāhmaṇa mahāsālā gahapati mahāsālā tathāgate abhippasannā.
anya-e0901n:256_3: Te tathāgatassa sarīrapūjaṃ karissantī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:257: Pucchā – bhagavā āvuso purimadivase pucchita vissajjitakkamena mahāsudassana suttantaṃ desetvā subhaddaṃnāma paribbājakaṃ buddhaveneyyesu pacchimasāvakabhūtaṃ kathaṃ vinesi.
anya-e0901n:258_0: Vissajjanā – yasmiṃ kho subhadda dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati,
anya-e0901n:258_1: samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhati, dutiyopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati, tatiyopi tattha
anya-e0901n:258_2: samaṇo na upalabbhati, catutthopi tattha samaṇo na upalabbhati (peyyāla). Ime ca
anya-e0901n:258_3: subhadda bhikkhū sammā vihareyyuṃ, asuñño loko arahantehi assa, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0901n:258_4: subhaddaṃ paribbājakaṃ buddhaveneyyesu pacchimaṃ sakkhisāvakaṃ vinesi.
anya-e0901n:260_0: Pucchā – pacchime panāvuso kāle bhagavā āyasmato ānandassa kīdisaṃ vacanaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e0901n:260_1: kathañca bhikkhū pavāretvā, kīdisañca bhikkhūnaṃ vacanaṃ āmantetvā, kathañca anupādisesāya
anya-e0901n:261_0: Vissajjanā – bhagavā bhante pacchime kāle āyasmato ānandassa siyā kho panānanda tumhākaṃ
anya-e0901n:261_1: evamassa atītasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ natthi no satthāti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ kathetvā,
anya-e0901n:261_2: siyā kho pana bhikkhave ekabhikkhussāpi kaṅkhā vā vimati vā buddhe vā dhamme vā saṅghe
anya-e0901n:261_3: vā magge vā paṭipadāya vāti evamādinā bhikkhū pavāretvā, handadāni bhikkhave āmantayāmi
anya-e0901n:261_4: vo, vayadhammā saṅkhārā appamādena sampādethāti pacchimañca ovādavacanaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0901n:261_5: āmantetvā, nava anupubbasamāpattiyo anulomaṃ paṭilomaṃ samāpajjitvā, catutthajjhānā
anya-e0901n:262: Nāvuso ānanda bhagavā parinibbuto, saññāvedayita nirodhaṃ samāpanno.
anya-e0901n:264: Pucchā – mahāsudassanasuttaṃ panāvuso purimadivase pucchitañca vissajjitañca, janavasabhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:265_0: Vissajjanā – nātike bhante giñjakāvasathe āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0901n:265_1: bhante ānando māgadhake paricārake ārabbha bhagavato sammukhā parikathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n:267: Pucchā – mahāgovindasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:270: Pucchā – mahāsamayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:273: Pucchā – sakkapañhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:274_0: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante pācīnato rājagahassa ambasaṇḍā nāma brāhmaṇagāmo, tassuttarato
anya-e0901n:274_1: vediyake pabbate indasālaguhāyaṃ sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, sakko bhante
anya-e0901n:274_2: devānamindo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:276: Pucchā – mahāsatipaṭṭhānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:277: Vissajjanā – kurūsu bhante kammāsadhamme nāma kurūnaṃ nigame bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:279: Pucchā – pāyāsi suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:280_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante setabyānāma kosalānaṃ nagaraṃ uttarena setabyaṃ siṃsapāvane
anya-e0901n:280_1: āyasmatā kumārakassapena pāyāsiṃ rājaññaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, pāyāsissa bhante rājaññassa
anya-e0901n:280_2: evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti, itipi natthi paroloko natthi sattā opapātikā
anya-e0901n:280_3: natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipākoti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:281_0: Pucchā – tatthāvuso pāyāsissa rājaññassa diṭṭhipakāsanāca āyasmato kumārakassapattherassa
anya-e0901n:281_1: diṭṭhiviniveṭṭhanakathā ca anekavāraṃ āgatā, tatthāvuso paṭhamaṃ pāyāsi rājañño attano
anya-e0901n:281_2: diṭṭhiṃ kathaṃ pakāsesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0901n:282_0: Vissajjanā – pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca
anya-e0901n:282_1: “ahañhi bho kassapa evaṃ vādī evaṃ diṭṭhī itipi natthi paroloko, natthi sattā opapātikā,
anya-e0901n:282_2: natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ki, evaṃ kho bhante pāyāsirājañño
anya-e0901n:282_3: attano micchādiṭṭhiṃ āyasmato kumārakassapassa santike pakāsesi. Āyasmā ca kumārakassapo
anya-e0901n:282_4: sakkhikāraṇaṃ candimasūriyaupamaṃ dassetvā pāyāsissa rājaññassa taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0901n:283_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa micchādiṭṭhikassa
anya-e0901n:283_1: saddhammavimukhibhūtassa paccakkhato paralokaṃ dassetvā taṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ viniveṭhesi.
anya-e0901n:284_0: Pucchā – atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño dutiyampi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:284_1: attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena
anya-e0901n:285_0: Vissajjanā – dutiye pana bhante pāyāsirājañño attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite duccaritasamaṅgino
anya-e0901n:285_1: kālaṃkate sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano micchāvādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, āyasmā ca kumārakassapo
anya-e0901n:285_2: coraupamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:286: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:287_0: Pucchā – atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño tatiyampi kīdisaṃ sādhaka pariyāyaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:287_1: attanovādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena
anya-e0901n:288_0: Vissajjanā – tatiyampana bhante pāyāsirājañño attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite sucaritasamaṅgino
anya-e0901n:288_1: kālaṃkate dassetvā attano micchāvādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, āyasmā ca kumārakassapo gūthakūpe
anya-e0901n:288_2: patapurisopamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:289: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:290: Pucchā – āyasmatā āvuso kumārakassapena purimadivase pucchitavissajjitakkamena gūthakūpapurisaupamāya micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dhammavāde patiṭṭhāpiyamāne piyāsirājañño
anya-e0901n:291_0: Catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ vā kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attanovādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
anya-e0901n:291_1: kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo sahadhammena taṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:292_0: Vissajjanā – pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmatā kumārakassapena gūthakūpe nimuggapuriso
anya-e0901n:292_1: pamāya micchāvādaṃ suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavāde patiṭṭhāpite catutthaṃ vā pañcamaṃ
anya-e0901n:292_2: vā attano mittāmacce ñātisālohite samādinna pañcasīle sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano
anya-e0901n:292_3: micchāvādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi. Āyasmā ca kumārakassapo tāvatiṃsadevopamāya ca jaccandhopamāya
anya-e0901n:292_4: cāti dvīhi upamāhi taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā,
anya-e0901n:293_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa dve upamāyo
anya-e0901n:293_1: dassetvā uppannaṃ pāpakaṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena saniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:294_0: Pucchā – atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño chaṭṭhaṃpi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:294_1: attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo sahadhammena taṃ micchāvādaṃ
anya-e0901n:295: Vissajjanā – chaṭṭhaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño sīlavante samaṇabrāhmaṇe kalyāṇadhamme jīvitukāme amaritukāme
anya-e0901n:296_0: Sukhakāme dukkhapaṭikūle sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, āyasmāca
anya-e0901n:296_1: kumārakassapo gabbhinī upamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā
anya-e0901n:297: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo gabbhinīupamaṃ dassetvā taṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭikkhipitvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:298_0: Pucchā – atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño sattamaṃpi kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:298_1: attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena
anya-e0901n:299_0: Vissajjanā – sattamaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño kubbhiyaṃ pakkhipitvā māritapurisaṃ
anya-e0901n:299_1: sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, āyasmāca kumārakassapo supinakūpamāya
anya-e0901n:299_2: taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:300: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo supinakūpamaṃ dassetvā uppannaṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:301_0: Pucchā – atha panāvuso pāyāsirājañño aṭṭhamampi navamampi kathetabbaṃ kathetvā dasamaṃ
anya-e0901n:301_1: kīdisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo
anya-e0901n:302_0: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhamampi bhante navamampi pāyāsirājañño yaṃ vā taṃ vā pariyāyaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:302_1: attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, dasamaṃ pana bhante pāyāsirājañño chaviādīni chinditvā
anya-e0901n:302_2: māritapurisaṃ sādhakapariyāyaṃ dassetvā attano vādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi, āyasmā ca kumārakassapo
anya-e0901n:302_3: aggikajaṭilopamāya taṃ micchāvādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā dhammavādaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0901n:303: Paṭinissajjetaṃ rājañña pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ. Paṭinissajjetaṃ rājañña pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
anya-e0901n:304: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo opāyikaṃ upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ paṭinissajjāpesi, yaṃ tassa bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n:305_0: Pucchā – āyasmatā āvuso kumārakassapena purimadivase pucchitavissajjitākārena pāyāsissa
anya-e0901n:305_1: rājaññassa aggikajaṭilopamaṃ dassetvā tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate paṭinissajjāpite so
anya-e0901n:305_2: tāva therassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvā kīdisañca paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi, kathañca thero
anya-e0901n:305_3: karuṇāsītalahadayo hutvā aparampi upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n:306_0: Vissajjanā – pāyāsi bhante rājañño āyasmatā kumārakassapena aggikajaṭilopamaṃ dassetvā
anya-e0901n:306_1: taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpite kiñcāpi bhavaṃ kassapo evamāha, atha kho
anya-e0901n:306_2: nevāhaṃ sakkomi idaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjitunti evamādikaṃ paccanīkakathaṃ
anya-e0901n:306_3: kathesi, thero ca bhante kumārakassapo dve satthavāhopamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n:307_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa
anya-e0901n:307_1: dve satthavāhopamampi dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi, tañhi tassa
anya-e0901n:307_2: ca tadanuyāyīnañca bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n:308_0: Pucchā – evaṃ panāvuso āyasmatā kumārakassapena yathā vuttāhi bahūhi upamāhi ca aparāhi
anya-e0901n:308_1: gūthabhārikaakkhadhuttakopamāhi ca tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate vissajjāpite so tāva
anya-e0901n:308_2: therassa vacanaṃ anādiyitvāva pacchimapaṭikkhepavasena kīdisaṃ paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi,
anya-e0901n:308_3: kathañca thero karuṇāsītalahadayo hutvā pacchimampi upamaṃ dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n:309_0: Vissajjanā – pāyāsi bhante rājañño evaṃ therena nānāupamāhi tasmiṃ pāpake diṭṭhigate
anya-e0901n:309_1: paṭinissajjāpitepi purimanayeneva therassa paccanīkakathaṃ kathesi, theropi ca bhante
anya-e0901n:309_2: pacchimaṃ sāṇabhārikūpamaṃ dassetvā karuṇāsītalahadayo taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi.
anya-e0901n:310_0: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, sādhu kho āvuso yaṃ āyasmā kumārakassapo pāyāsissa rājaññassa
anya-e0901n:310_1: sāṇabhārikopamampi dassetvā taṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ paṭinissajjāpesi, tañhi tassa
anya-e0901n:310_2: ca tadanuyāyīnañca bhaveyya dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya.
anya-e0901n:311_0: Pucchā – imāya panāvuso pacchimikāya sāṇabhārikopamāya dassitāya pāyāsirājañño therassa
anya-e0901n:311_1: dhammadesanānubhāvena imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno hutvā kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi,
anya-e0901n:311_2: kathañca āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ anusāsaniṃ yāci, kathañcāyasmā kumārakassapo anusāsi.
anya-e0901n:312_0: Vissajjanā – imāya ca pana bhante upamāya dassitāya pāyāsi rājañño “purimeneva ahaṃ
anya-e0901n:312_1: opammena bhoto kassapassa attamano abhiraddho evamādinā bhante pāyāsirājañño imasmiṃ
anya-e0901n:312_2: dhammavinaye āyasmato kumārakassapassa dhammadesanāya pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0901n:312_3: Icchāmi cāhaṃ bho kassapa mahāyaññaṃ yajituṃ, anusāsatu maṃ bhavaṃ kassapo yaṃ mamassa
anya-e0901n:312_4: dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyāti pāyāsi rājañño āyasmantaṃ kumārakassapaṃ anusāsaniṃ
anya-e0901n:312_5: yāci, āyasmā ca bhante kumārakassapo dukkhette dubbhūme pavuttabījopamāya dussīlesu
anya-e0901n:312_6: dinnadānassa na mahapphalabhāvaṃ dassetvā sukhette subhūme pavuttabījopamāya sīlavantesu
anya-e0901n:313: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso pāyāsirājañño dānaṃ adāsi, kathañcassa samparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0901n:314_0: Vissajjanā – pāyāsi bhante rājañño asakkaccaṃ dānamadāsi, asahatthā dānamadāsi, acittīkataṃ
anya-e0901n:314_1: dānamadāsi, apaviddhaṃ dānamadāsi, so asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ datvā asahatthā dānaṃ datvā
anya-e0901n:314_2: acittīkataṃ dānaṃ datvā apaviddhaṃ dānaṃ datvā kāyassabhedā paraṃ maraṇā cātumahārājikānaṃ
anya-e0901n:314_3: devānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajji suññaṃ serīsakaṃ vimānaṃ.
anya-e0901n:315: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena pāthiyavagge paṭhamaṃ pāthiyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:316_0: Vissajjanā – mallesu bhante anupiye nāma mallānaṃ nigame bhaggavagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ
anya-e0901n:316_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, bhaggavagotto bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “purimāni
anya-e0901n:316_2: bhante divasāni purimatarāni sunakkhatto licchaviputto yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0901n:316_3: maṃ etadavoca “paccakkhāto dāni mayā bhaggava bhagavā, na dānāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ uddissa
anya-e0901n:316_4: viharāmī’ti, kacce taṃ bhante tatheva, yathā sunakkhatto, licchaviputto avacā”ti,
anya-e0901n:318: Pucchā – udumbarikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:319_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante nigrodhaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, nigrodho bhante
anya-e0901n:319_1: paribbājako bhagavato parammukhā bhagavantaṃyeva ārabbha anekavihitaṃ abhūtakathaṃ
anya-e0901n:321: Pucchā – cakkavattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:322: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante mātulāyaṃ sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha attajjhāsayena suttanikkhepena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:324: Pucchā – aggaññasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:325: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pubbārāme migāramātupāsāde vāseṭṭhaṃ pabbajitaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, brāhmaṇā bhante vāseṭṭha bhāradvāje pabbajite akkosanti paribhāsanti attarūpāya
anya-e0901n:326: Paribhāsāya paripuṇṇāya no aparipuṇṇāya, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:327: Pucchā – sampasādanīya suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:328: Vissajjanā – nāḷandāyaṃ bhante pāvārikambavane āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:330: Pucchā – pāsādikasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:331_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante vedhaññānāma sakyānaṃ ambavane pāsāde cundaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ
anya-e0901n:331_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, cundo bhante samaṇuddeso pāvāyaṃ nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa kālaṃ
anya-e0901n:331_2: kiriyāya bhinnānaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ dvedhikajātānaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ
anya-e0901n:331_3: aññamaññaṃ mukhasattīhi vitujjanakāraṇaṃ āyasmato ānandassa ārocesi, āyasmā ca bhante
anya-e0901n:331_4: ānando bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesi, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:333: Pucchā – lakkhaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:336: Pucchā – siṅgālasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:337_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante siṅgālaṃ gahapatiputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, siṅgālo bhante
anya-e0901n:337_1: gahapatiputto kālasseva uṭṭhāya rājagahā nikkhamitvā allavattho allakeso pañjaliko
anya-e0901n:337_2: puthudisā namassati puratthimaṃ disaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ pacchimaṃ disaṃ uttaraṃ disaṃ
anya-e0901n:337_3: heṭṭhimaṃ disaṃ uparimaṃ disaṃ, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:339: Pucchā – āṭānāṭiyasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:340_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante gijjhakūṭe pabbate bhāsitaṃ, bhagavati bhante rājagahe
anya-e0901n:340_1: viharati cattāro mahārājāno catuddisaṃ rakkhaṃ ṭhapetvā catuddisaṃ gumbaṃ ṭhapetvā
anya-e0901n:340_2: catuddisaṃ ovaraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭapabbataṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā
anya-e0901n:340_3: tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0901n:340_4: nisinno kho bhante vessavaṇo mahārājā āṭānāṭiyaṃ rakkhaṃ bhagavato ārocesi bhikkhūnaṃ
anya-e0901n:340_5: bhikkhunīnaṃ upāsakānaṃ upāsikānaṃ phāsuvihārāya, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:342: Pucchā – saṅgīti suttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:343: Vissajjanā – pāvāyaṃ bhante āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:345: Pucchā – dasuttarasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:346: Vissajjanā – dasuttarasuttaṃ bhante campāyaṃ gaggarāya pokkharaṇiyā tīre āyasmatā sāriputtena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0901n:348: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0901n:352: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
